ApplicationData.text: JMMC framework, enabling better user interface and platform integration across Mac, Linux and Windows through numerous third-party libraries and in-house code

package.name: JSAMP
package.description: JSAMP is a Java toolkit for use with the Simple Applications Messaging Protocol. Made by Mark Taylor, working in the Astrophysics Group at Bristol University.

package.name: AppleJavaExtensions
package.description: Adapt menus for Mac OS X.

package.name: BrowserLauncher2
package.description: Permit to use the default web browser.

package.name: jhall
package.description: Show a help window from JavaHelp Jar file.

package.name: JHelpDev
package.description: Easy to use yet full featured help authoring tool for the JavaHelp system.

package.name: xmlenc
package.description: Fast stream-based XML output library for Java.

package.name: JTidy
package.description: HTML syntax checker and pretty printer.

package.name: SLF4J
package.description: The Simple Logging Facade for Java or (SLF4J) serves as a simple facade or abstraction for various logging frameworks, e.g. java.util.logging, log4j and logback, allowing the end user to plug in the desired logging framework at deployment time.

package.name: Logback
package.description: Logback is intended as a successor to the popular log4j project, picking up where log4j leaves off.

package.name: JAXB
package.description: Java Architecture for XML Binding (JAXB) allows Java developers to map Java classes to XML representations.

package.name: Activation
package.description: Standard services to determine the type of an arbitrary piece of data, encapsulate access to it, discover the operations available on it, and to instantiate the appropriate bean to perform said operation(s).

package.name: commons-httpclient
package.description: HTTP Client (used to send HTTP POST requests).

package.name: commons-codec
package.description: Commons Codec provides implementations of common encoders and decoders such as Base64, Hex, Phonetic and URLs.

package.name: commons-lang
package.description: Provide much needed additions to the standard JDK's java.lang package.

prerelease.change: Fix Mac OS X integration for JDK9+
Update release note still TBD !
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.service.BrowserLauncher.java : improved linux browser support and use the WEB_BROWSER preference.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.component.CommonPreferencesView.java : added new embeddable JPanel to edit common preferences (web browser selector).
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.data.preference.CommonPreferences.java : added the WEB_BROWSER preference.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.network.NetworkSettings.java : added method getHostIP(hostname) to resolve the IP address for the given hostname (or use CommonPreferences).
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.App.java : added optional hook to log the application state when submitting a feedback report: getStateForFeedbackReport().
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.FeedbackReport.java : added 'Application state' into Details.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.FeedbackReport.java : always display Cancel and Submit buttons.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.util.MCSExceptionHandler : modified isFilteredException(th) to ignore XRender issue (linux) on JDK8 with multiple displays.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.util.StringUtils : added removeUnderscores()
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.data.app.ApplicationDescription : added parseVersion()
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.data.MimeType.java : added PNG and JPG mime types
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.App.java : force headless mode for command-line actions (ExecMode.TTY).
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.App.java : added optional hook to perform command-line actions: processShellCommandLine().
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.App.java : added argument help in addCustomCommandLineArgument() method parameters.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.App.java : removed addCustomArgumentsHelp(): use addCustomCommandLineArgument() instead.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.App.java : added execution mode (ExecMode.GUI or ExecMode.TTY) in addCustomCommandLineArgument() method parameters.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.App.java : openCommandLineFile() made public to reuse it in command-line actions.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.util.WindowUtils.java : Improved multi-monitor support = use window's display instead of the primary display if possible to center windows on the appropriate display
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.util.WindowUtils.java : Fix NPE when restoring window size in case of GraphicsDevice.getDisplayMode() returns null
Head less mode handling: exit properly but log the message: "Unable to start the GUI application [...] (headless mode enabled)"
In the Help menu 'User Manual' action : Now open ApplicationData.xml 'documentation link' attribute (if present) in the user's default web browser.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.component.StatusBar.java : added custom panel support (add / remove)
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.component.StatusBar.java : added a JVM memory monitor and fixed layout to truncate long messages but keep logo displayed
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.network.NetworkSettings.java : define https proxy identical to http proxy; added parsing the 'http_proxy' environment variable at last
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.data.MimeType.java : Added VOTable mimetype
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.component.SearchField.java : Added empty performCancel() method to cancel any background operation

In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.component.SearchField.java : Added cleanText(text) method to clean up the current text value before calling action listeners and update the text field. By default, it trims and removes redundant white space characters.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.component.SearchField.java : Added a CustomPlainDocument to define the newLine replacement character (' ' by default) used by copy/paste operations.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.network.http.Http.java : Modified the http retry handler: use new DefaultHttpMethodRetryHandler(0, false) to never retry requests.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.network.http.Http.java : Added new download(), post() and execute(method) methods to use the given HttpClient.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.util.CollectionUtils.java : check for nulls in toString() methods.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.data.preference.PreferencedDocument.java : Added a timer to limit save on disk access.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.util.FileUtils.java : Added unzip() method to unzip a file into another one.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.App.java : Added state APP_CLEANUP_FAIL corresponding to an exception thrown during App.cleanup().
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.App.java : Improved getFrame() to create an empty frame displayed in OS toolbar to better show message dialogs during startup.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.App.java : Use setFrame(new JFrame()) to create a new frame with standard behaviour (quit on close).

In fr.jmmc.jmcs.Bootstrapper.java : Catch any exception thrown by App.cleanup() and open a feedback report (once). Avoid reentrance in stopApp() that can be called in many places (quitAction, window closing listeners, feedback report).
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.Bootstrapper.java, src.main.resources.fr.jmmc.jmcs.resource.ApplicationData.xml : Added framework version number logging at bootstrap.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.JVMUtils.java : Added JVM Utils (java heap information, nb cpus).

In fr.jmmc.jmcs.data.app.ApplicationDescription.java : Fixed getInstance() to try loading the application data model first then return the the default data model. Fixed loadApplicationData() to set _appDataModel only if the file was loaded sucessfully (not the default data model).
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.data.preference.Preferences.java : Added dumpDefaultProperties() and dumpProperties(props, sb).
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.data.preference.SessionSettingsPreferences.java : Added getApplicationFileStorage().
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.FeedbackReport.java : Ensure window is visible (may create a default application frame) like other message dialogs. avoid reentrance in dispose().
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.HelpView.java : Fixed Classloader issue for JNLP and removed old workaround for JDK 1.5 . 1.6.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.component.DismissableMessagePane.java : Added setPreferenceState() and getPreferenceState() method.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.component.FileChooser.java : Renamed ExtendedFileChooser as JmcsFileChooser. Remember window size for file dialogs (any flavor).
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.component.StatusBar.java : Improved design to use weak singleton pattern and ensure StatusBar is created by EDT do not show messages if not enabled.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.task.TaskSwingWorker.java : Use MCSExceptionHandler to uniformly intercept and filter exceptions.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.gui.util.WindowUtils.java : Generalized to any Window instance (Dialog, JDialog, Frame, JFrame).
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.network.interop.SampMetaData.java : Added broadcast message flag.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.util.FileUtils.java : First implementation of an abstraction layer that retrieve remote files in a common dir (a commmon preference has been created).
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.util.FileUtils.java : Added getPlatform...Path() methods for Preferences, Caches and Documents.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.util.FileUtils.java : Added getName() method to get filenameWithoutExtension and its extension simultaneously.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.util.FileUtils.java : Fixed empty file name and extension in retrieveRemoteFile().
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.util.FileUtils.java : Fixed isRemote bug.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.util.FileUtils.java : Prevents getName from NPE.

In fr.jmmc.jmcs.util.MCSExceptionHandler.java : Filter reentrant exception and repeated OutOfMemoryError (>3) but log them. If more than 3 OutOfMemoryError, do not show FeedbackReport anymore. If the Swing exception handler is enabled, show OutOfMemoryError in status bar.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.util.concurrent.FixedThreadPoolExecutor.java : Added waitForTaskFinished() to wait for cancelled tasks finish.
In fr.jmmc.jmcs.util.concurrent.ParallelJobExecutor.java : Wait for threads to finish their task (cancellation).
